raw_body:
SAPARAMADU – BENEDICT – At Rest with Jesus – Mr Benedict Saparamadu (Formerly of University of Colombo). Beloved husband of late Erin Saparamadu,​ loving father of Dr Minoli,​ Harin and Kshanaka,​ father-in-law of Dr Prasanna Goonewardena,​ Shanika & Apeksha,​ darling seeya of Nirasha,​ Ashini,​ Sheneli,​ Shevantha & Ashenka. His mortal remains will lie at A.F. Raymonds’ Funeral Parlour,​ Borella on 2nd March from 9 a.m. onwards. Burial at 4.30 p.m. at General Cemetery,​ Borella – Roman Catholic Section.
015528
